	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="")]
	[System.SerializableAttribute()]
	public class RefundthetransactionRequest
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// This field is filled with the content of the cart of the transaction, which can be obtained using [Get Orders](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/orders#getorder) or [Transaction Details](https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-rest-api/reference/transaction-process#transactiondetails) endpoints. It should only be included for transactions with split payment.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="minicart")]
		public RefundthetransactionRequestMinicart Minicart { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Value of the purchase.
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="value")]
		public int Value { get; set; }
	}
	
	public class RefundthetransactionRequestMinicart
	{
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="freight")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> Freight { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="items")]
		public string[] Items { get; set; }
		
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="tax")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> Tax { get; set; }
	}

		/// <summary>
		/// Required

		public string CommitmentToken { get; set; }

		/// Required
		/// </summary>

		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="fields")]
		public Field[] Fields { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]

	public partial class Misc
	{
		
		private System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient;
		
		private JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings;
		
		public Misc(System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient, JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings=null)
		{
			if (httpClient == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("Null HttpClient.", "httpClient");

			if (httpClient.BaseAddress == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("HttpClient has no BaseAddress", "httpClient");

			this.httpClient = httpClient;
			this.jsonSerializerSettings = jsonSerializerSettings;
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 2.1 Send Payments Information Public
		/// The second step to create a new transaction. Here, you have the option to send the data in three diferent ways: doing a private request, a public request or a private request that uses a saved Credit Card.
		/// ApiPubTransactions_transactionIdPaymentsPostByOrderId api/pub/transactions/{transactionId}/payments
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPubTransactions_transactionIdPaymentsPostByOrderIdAsync(string orderId, string transactionId, _2SendPaymentsPublicRequest[] requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pub/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/payments?orderId=" + (orderId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(orderId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Affiliations
		/// Returns all affiliations that your provider can handle.
		/// ApiPvtAffiliationsGet api/pvt/affiliations
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtAffiliationsGetAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/affiliations";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Insert Affiliation
		/// Creates a new affiliation and returns a successful response.
		/// ApiPvtAffiliationsPost api/pvt/affiliations
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtAffiliationsPostAsync(InsertAffiliationRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/affiliations";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Affiliation By Id
		/// Returns associated data for the specified affiliation Id, like name and implementation, for example.
		/// ApiPvtAffiliations_affiliationIdGet api/pvt/affiliations/{affiliationId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtAffiliations_affiliationIdGetAsync(string affiliationId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)

		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Update Affiliation
		/// Returns all affiliations.

		/// </summary>

		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/affiliations/"+ (affiliationId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(affiliationId));

			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Installments options
		/// Returns the best installment options according to the informed params.
		/// ApiPvtInstallmentsGetByRequest_valueAndRequest_salesChannelAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_idAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_valueAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_bin api/pvt/installments
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtInstallmentsGetByRequest_valueAndRequest_salesChannelAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_idAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_valueAndRequest_paymentDetails_0_binAsync(int request_value, int request_salesChannel, int request_paymentDetails_0_id, int request_paymentDetails_0_value, int request_paymentDetails_0_bin, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/installments?request.value="+request_value+"&request.salesChannel="+request_salesChannel+"&request.paymentDetails[0].id="+request_paymentDetails_0_id+"&request.paymentDetails[0].value="+request_paymentDetails_0_value+"&request.paymentDetails[0].bin="+request_paymentDetails_0_bin;
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Available Payment Methods
		/// Returns enabled payment methods, like visa, master, bankissueinvoice that are shown for the final user and enabled to receive payment.

		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtMerchantsPayment_systemsGetAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)

		/// <summary>
		/// Rules
		/// Returns all rules conditions your provider can handle.
		/// ApiPvtRulesGet api/pvt/rules
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtRulesGetAsync(Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/rules";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Insert Rule
		/// Creates a new rule and returns a successful response.
		/// ApiPvtRulesPost api/pvt/rules
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtRulesPostAsync(InsertRuleRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/rules";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Delete Rule
		/// Deletes rules by specified Id.
		/// ApiPvtRules_ruleIdDelete api/pvt/rules/{ruleId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtRules_ruleIdDeleteAsync(string ruleId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/rules/"+ (ruleId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ruleId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Delete, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Rule By Id
		/// Returns rule by specified RuleId.
		/// ApiPvtRules_ruleIdGet api/pvt/rules/{ruleId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtRules_ruleIdGetAsync(string ruleId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/rules/"+ (ruleId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ruleId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Rule By Id
		/// Update Rule.
		/// ApiPvtRules_ruleIdPut api/pvt/rules/{ruleId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtRules_ruleIdPutAsync(string ruleId, RuleByIdRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/rules/"+ (ruleId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(ruleId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 1. Starts a new transaction
		/// This request is the first step to create a new transaction.
		/// ApiPvtTransactionsPost api/pvt/transactions
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactionsPostAsync(_1CreateanewtransactionRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Transaction Details
		/// Returns associated data for the specified transaction id, like value and status, for exemple.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdGet api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdGetAsync(string transactionId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 3. Send Additional Data
		/// The third step to create a new transaction. It will send the additional related data to the transaction, like billig and shipping adress.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdAdditional_dataPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/additional-data
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="transactionId">Transaction identification.</param>
		/// <returns>OK</returns>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdAdditional_dataPostAsync(string transactionId, _3SendAdditionalDataRequest[] requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/additional-data";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Do authorization
		/// The fouth and last step to create a new transaction. It will authorized the new transction creation acorrdint to the data previously informed in the latests requests.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdAuthorization_requestPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/authorization-request
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdAuthorization_requestPostAsync(string transactionId, _4DoauthorizationRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/authorization-request";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Cancel the transaction
		/// Cancel's transaction that was previously approved, but not settled.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdCancellation_requestPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/cancellation-request
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdCancellation_requestPostAsync(string transactionId, CancelthetransactionRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/cancellation-request";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 2.2 Send Payments With Saved Credit Card
		/// The second step to create a new transaction. Here, you have the option to send the data in three diferent ways: doing a private request, a public request or a private request that uses a saved Credit Card.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdPaymentsPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/payments
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdPaymentsPostAsync(string transactionId, _2SendPaymentsWithSavedCreditCardRequest[] requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/payments";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Payment Details
		/// Returns associated information details for the specified payment id.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdPayments_paymentIdGet api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/payments/{paymentId}
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdPayments_paymentIdGetAsync(string transactionId, string paymentId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/payments/"+ (paymentId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(paymentId));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Refund the transaction
		/// Refunds transaction's value that was previously settled.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdRefunding_requestPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/refunding-request
		/// </summary>
		public async Task ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdRefunding_requestPostAsync(string transactionId, RefundthetransactionRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/refunding-request";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Settle the transaction
		/// Settles transaction's value.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdSettlement_requestPost api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/settlement-request
		/// </summary>
		public async Task<SettleResponse> ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdSettlement_requestPostAsync(string transactionId, SettlethetransactionRequest requestBody, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/settlement-request";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<SettleResponse>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Transaction Settlement  Details
		/// Returns associated settlements data for the specified transaction id.
		/// ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdSettlementsGet api/pvt/transactions/{transactionId}/settlements
		/// </summary>
		public async Task<TransactionSettlementDetails> ApiPvtTransactions_transactionIdSettlementsGetAsync(string transactionId, Action<System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpRequestHeaders> handleHeaders = null)
		{
			var requestUri = "api/pvt/transactions/"+ (transactionId==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(transactionId))+"/settlements";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			if (handleHeaders != null)
			{
				handleHeaders(httpRequestMessage.Headers);
			}

			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
				var responseMessageStream = await responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStreamAsync();
				using (JsonReader jsonReader = new JsonTextReader(new System.IO.StreamReader(responseMessageStream)))
				{
				var serializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
				return serializer.Deserialize<TransactionSettlementDetails>(jsonReader);
				}
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

namespace Fonlow.Net.Http
{
	using System.Net.Http;

	public class WebApiRequestException : HttpRequestException
	{
		public new System.Net.HttpStatusCode StatusCode { get; private set; }

		public string Response { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders Headers { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue ContentType { get; private set; }

		public WebApiRequestException(string message, System.Net.HttpStatusCode statusCode, string response, System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders headers, System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue contentType) : base(message)
		{
			StatusCode = statusCode;
			Response = response;
			Headers = headers;
			ContentType = contentType;
		}
	}

	public static class ResponseMessageExtensions
	{
		public static void EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx(this HttpResponseMessage responseMessage)
		{
			if (!responseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode)
			{
				var responseText = responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().Result;
				var contentType = responseMessage.Content.Headers.ContentType;
				throw new WebApiRequestException(responseMessage.ReasonPhrase, responseMessage.StatusCode, responseText, responseMessage.Headers, contentType);
			}
		}
	}
}
